major.name: C Major
major.description: Pure & Simple: neutral, innocent, straightforward, optimistic; perfect for clarity-focused work or learning new concepts.

major.name: G Major
major.description: Bright & Pastoral: cheerful, outdoorsy, uplifting; ideal for creative brainstorming or collaborative work.

major.name: D Major
major.description: Triumphant & Celebratory: bold, victorious, inspiring; good for breakthrough moments and motivational energy.

major.name: A Major
major.description: Confident & Radiant: warm, assured, glowing; balanced for sustained productivity sessions requiring focus and optimism.

major.name: E Major
major.description: Luminous & Exalted: bright, powerful, ethereal; good for inspiration, deep focus, or meditation-in-motion tasks.

major.name: B Major
major.description: Brilliant & Sharp: intense, crystalline, attention-demanding; ideal for analytical or detail-oriented work.

major.name: F# Major
major.description: Dreamy & Complex: ethereal, introspective, sophisticated; for nuanced creative work or complex problem-solving.

major.name: F Major
major.description: Peaceful & Pastoral: gentle, grounded, harmonious; for sustained calm focus without drowsiness.

major.name: Bb Major
major.description: Warm & Generous: rich, comforting; excellent for creative, communication, or collaborative tasks.

major.name: Eb Major
major.description: Majestic & Noble: grand, elevated, dignified; suitable for presentations, strategic planning, or work requiring gravitas.

major.name: Ab Major
major.description: Lush & Introspective: deep, emotionally rich; ideal for reflective work or tasks needing emotional intelligence.

major.name: Db Major
major.description: Mysterious & Enveloping: dark-bright, immersive; good for deep concentration or complex creative work.

minor.name: A Minor
minor.description: Natural & Unadorned: pure melancholy, introspective; perfect for neutral focus or analytical tasks.

minor.name: E Minor
minor.description: Pensive & Contemplative: thoughtful, serious; excellent for problem-solving or deep concentration.

minor.name: B Minor
minor.description: Lonely & Searching: isolated, emotionally complex; suited for persistent or solitary tasks.

minor.name: F# Minor
minor.description: Dark & Passionate: intense, brooding; ideal for emotionally authentic creative work.

minor.name: C# Minor
minor.description: Tragic & Profound: heavy, dramatic; best for work requiring catharsis or creative processing.

minor.name: G# Minor
minor.description: Anguished & Intense: sharp, emotionally extreme; for pushing through discomfort or internal struggle.

minor.name: D# Minor
minor.description: Rare & Otherworldly: alien, unsettling; useful for experimental or unconventional work.

minor.name: D Minor
minor.description: Serious & Determined: resolved melancholy; for disciplined, purposeful work.

minor.name: G Minor
minor.description: Passionate & Restless: agitated, urgent; excellent for deadline-driven or tension-based work.

minor.name: C Minor
minor.description: Solemn & Heroic: dark but dignified; suitable for powering through challenges.

minor.name: F Minor
minor.description: Gloomy & Resigned: deep melancholy; for sustained work through unpleasant tasks.

minor.name: Bb Minor
minor.description: Dark & Mysterious: shadowy, enigmatic; for investigative or research-focused work.

minor.name: Eb Minor
minor.description: Anxious & Oppressive: heavy, burdensome; use sparingly for truly challenging sessions.

minor.name: Ab Minor
minor.description: Desolate & Remote: cold, distant; suitable for purely analytical work requiring emotional detachment.

tempos.description: Slow & Contemplative: deep downtempo, ambient; for reading, creative writing, or meditation.
Relaxed & Steady: laid-back hip-hop or chillwave; ideal for routine tasks or brainstorming.
Smooth & Groovy: classic hip-hop, reggae; sweet spot for steady productivity without urgency.
Balanced & Comfortable: universal tempo for general productivity and soft pop/rock tasks.
Moderate Energy: uptempo pop, disco; suitable for consistent energy and engagement.
Standard Dance Tempo: driving energy, great for repetitive tasks or sustained motivation.
Upbeat & Energetic: clear forward momentum, for speed and accuracy tasks.
High Energy & Driving: intense focus sessions or physical activity.
Intense & Propulsive: aggressive pace for crunch-time deliverables.
Aggressive & Fast: rapid iteration cycles or high-volume focus tasks.
Breakneck Pace: extreme tempo for mechanical tasks or physical training.
Maximum Velocity: almost percussive; best for ultra-short, high-intensity sessions.
